alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden and north central Leon Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Havana, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Macon Community Park, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Hinson, Forest Meadows Park, Levy Park, Lake Iamonia, Concord, Orchard Pond, Maclay State Gardens, Gibson and Killearn Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
